channel.title: Resources
channel.description: Save The World Books This is a list of the books that have a plan to save the world. There are surprisingly few of them. Most are not well known. Community Peter Block works with communities to help them find their voice and power. This book is a guide to what seems to work the best. Val Hammel is using this as a guide to how she can revitalize HAI and make it flourish. She thinks the way to save the world is to rebuild our communities. I strongly agree with her.
